title: fizzArray2
prompt: Given a number n, create and return a new string array of length n, containing the strings "0", "1" "2" .. through n-1. N may be 0, in which case just return a length 0 array. Note: String.valueOf(xxx) will make the String form of most types. The syntax to make a new string array is: new String[desired_length]  (See also: FizzBuzz Code)
